nodes.bodyText: Map now exactly fits the bounds, but this does not look very nice. This adds a buffer to the feature so the map is zoomed out a little.
Because the EPSG.io lookup uses the Code field, it makes sense to turn the Label and Code field around: Code first, then Label field.

We use EPSG.io because:

It offers a Proj4 definition (unlike EPSG.org for example)
It comes recommended by OpenLayers as well (see here and here)
